programme.desc: Cooper Flagg gets his first taste of the Duke-North Carolina rivalry as his No. 2 Blue Devils host. Flagg has been the driving force behind Duke's 14-game win streak. The freshman leads the Blue Devils in points, rebounds, assists, and blocks.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 8 Mustangs (11-1) and No. 17 Tigers (9-3) meet for the first time, in the ACC championship game. SMU went 8-0 in-conference in its first ACC campaign. Clemson plays in its 10th ACC final, losing in 2009 and winning eight from 2011 to 2022.
